isComposeMsgSender((uint32,bytes32,uint6.details: Applications can optionally choose to implement a separate composeMsg sender that is NOT the bridging layer.The default sender IS the OAppReceiver implementer.

params._origin: The origin information containing the source endpoint and sender address.  - srcEid: The source chain endpoint ID.  - sender: The sender address on the src chain.  - nonce: The nonce of the message.
